cold_email.title: Internship Application
cold_email.template:
Subject: {Your Name} - {Position} Application

Dear {Recipient Name},

I hope this email finds you well. My name is {Your Name}, a {Your Year} student at {Your University} studying {Your Major}. I am writing to express my interest in the {Position} position at {Company Name} that I found on {Job Board/Website}.

With my background in {Relevant Experience/Skills}, I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to {Company Name}'s {mention specific project or company goal if known}. {Additional sentence about how your skills align with the position}.

{Brief paragraph about relevant coursework, projects, or experience}.

I have attached my resume for your review, and I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my skills and experiences align with the needs of your team. I am available for an interview at your convenience.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of working with {Company Name}.

Sincerely,
{Your Name}
{Your Phone Number}
{Your Email}

linkedin_message.title: Connection Request
linkedin_message.template: Hi {Name}, I'm a {year} {major} student at {university}. I admired your work at {company} in {field}. Would love to connect and learn from your experience in the industry. Thanks!

linkedin_message.title: Informational Interview
linkedin_message.template: Hi {Name}, We're connected here on LinkedIn. I'm exploring careers in {industry} and your experience at {company} stands out. Would you be open to a 15-min chat about your career path? Thank you for considering.

follow_up.title: After Job Interview
follow_up.template:
Subject: Thank You - {Position Title} Interview

Dear {Interviewer's Name},

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to take a moment to thank you for the opportunity to interview for the {Position Title} position on {Interview Date}. I appreciated learning more about {specific topic discussed} and the role's responsibilities.

Our conversation reinforced my enthusiasm for the position and for joining the team at {Company Name}. {Reference something specific from the interview that went well or that you found particularly interesting}.

After our discussion, I am confident that my background in {relevant experience/skills} and my passion for {relevant field/interest} would enable me to make valuable contributions to your team.

{Optional: Address any point you wished to elaborate on or clarify from the interview}.

Please don't hesitate to contact me if you need any additional information to support my application. I look forward to hearing from you about the next steps in the process.

Thank you again for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
{Your Name}
{Your Phone Number}
{Your Email}
